Meetings.Raw: JUNE 10. HARLESTON, Open-air Dance at "Caltofts." Profits to be divided at the discretion of the Committee between National and local funds for Women's Suffrage.

Meetings.Location: NORTH OF ENGLAND SOCIETY, 85, Deansgate Arcade
Meetings.Raw: NORTH OF ENGLAND SOCIETY, Monthly Meeting, 85, Deansgate Arcade. Miss Ashton, "At Home."
JUNE 14. BIRMINGHAM, Midland Institute. Speaker, Miss Sadler.
BIRMINGHAM SOCIETY, Moseley, Drawing Room Meeting. Speakers, The Hon. Mrs. Bertrand Russell, Lady Isabel Margesson.
LONDON (Beckenham), 16, Sussex Square, W. Hostess, Mrs. Thomasson. Speakers, Mrs. Rackham, Miss Abadam.

Meetings.Location: BRIGHTON AND HOVE, Forfar's Restaurant, Western Road
Meetings.Raw: JUNE 15. BRIGHTON AND HOVE, Meeting for Members and their Friends, at Forfar's Restaurant, Western Road.
BIRMINGHAM SOCIETY, Wolverhampton, 52, Queen Street. Speaker, Miss Wodehouse.
JUNE 16. BIRMINGHAM SOCIETY, Open-air Meeting, Kings Norton. Speakers, Mrs. Cooper, Miss Gardner.
BRISTOL, Drawing-room Meeting. Hostesses, The Misses Sturge. Chair, Miss Talbot. Speaker, Mrs. Rackham.
BRISTOL, Drawing-room Meeting. Hostesses, The Misses Tanner. Speaker, Mrs. Rackham.
JUNE 17. BRISTOL, Drawing-room Meeting. Speaker, Mrs. Rackham.
LLANGOLLEN, Public Meeting, Town Hall. Speakers, Mrs. Cobden Sanderson, Mr. W. Lyon Blease L.L.M., Miss Helga Gill.
LONDON (Islington), Drawing-room Meeting, Women only, 186, Highbury New Park. Hostess, Miss Theodora Johnson.
JUNE 18. BIRMINGHAM, Olton, Schools, Men's League. Speaker, Miss Abadam.

Meetings.Location: WARWICK AND LEAMINGTON, Cumnor House, Kenilworth
Meetings.Raw: WARWICK AND LEAMINGTON, Monthly Meeting, Cumnor House, Kenilworth. Hostess, Miss Blatch Cox. Speaker, Miss Gardner.
JUNE 19. DERBY, Garden Meeting in the Friary Grounds, by kind permission of Mrs. Boden. Chair, Dr. Alice Stewart. Hostess, Mrs. Jacob Hood.
LONDON (Beckenham), The Friary. Speaker, Miss Abadam.
JUNE 22-29. BIRMINGHAM SOCIETY, Miss Costelloe and others.
JUNE 22. BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Bewdley. Stourport.
JUNE 23. BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Kidderminster. Stourbridge.
JUNE 24. NORTH HERTS., Drawing-room Meeting, by kind permission of Mr. and Mrs. Pearsall, at Glood Hame. Speaker, Hon. Mrs. Bertrand Russell.
NORTH HERTS., Public Meeting, Latchworth. Speaker, Hon. Mrs. Bertrand Russell. Chair, Dr. Hector Munro.
JUNE 25. BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Droitwich. Bromsgrove. Alvechurch.
BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Shipston. Kineton.
DERBY, Orpheus Hall, Stafford Street. Speakers, Miss Abadam, and Mr. Baillie-Weaver, LL.B., the Men's League for Women's Suffrage.
LONDON (Wandsworth), At Home. The Speaker, Miss Abadam.
WOLVERHAMPTON, 52, Queen Street. Chair, Miss Cook. Speaker, Mrs. Gerard Smith, "Woman's Suffrage."
JUNE 27. BIRMINGHAM, Meeting for Teachers, Westbourne, Edgbaston. Hostesses, The Misses Hill and Mrs. Shillington. Speakers, Miss Jenner, Rev. W. G. Tarrant, B.A.
BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Tamworth. Coleshill.
BIRMINGHAM, Motor Campaign. Cannock. Penkridge. Brewood.
JUNE 29. BIRMINGHAM, Midland Institute. Speaker, Mr. Tillyard.
JUNE 30. CARDIFF, Green Meadow, Garden Party. Hostess, Mrs. H. Lewis. Speaker, Miss Abadam.
